title: How do  I save data traffic？
answer:
1、Disable data service when it is not used.  
2、Disable data service in a Wi-Fi environment.  
3、Use a WAP website instead of a www website.  
4、Disable data service: Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115143603.PNG)> Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks, and then uncheck Data enabled.  
5、Disable background data synchronization: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115143612.PNG) > Settings > Accounts & sync and uncheck Background data and Auto-sync.
